ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: I would gladly pay that penalty.  I am much more likely to die trying to get back, and if I wasn t a bard it would be even worse.  Of course when I am 30th
ygData.messageBody:
I would gladly pay that penalty. I am much more likely to die trying to get
back, and if I wasn't a bard it would be even worse. Of course when I am
30th level that won't be true anymore, but by then it will be moot as we
will have then equivalent of ressurection of some typ in our group.

-----Original Message-----
From: Lange, Stephen [mailto:SLANGE@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 12:10 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>


:Also, there absolutely HAS to be a serious penalty for dying;

Why not make a Bard bind song take away the equivalent exp from each player
to bind. That would allow a person to get bound somewhere, but effectively
Lose the Exp equivalent to dying to get bound. Id call that a penalty that
you would have to serious weigh.. They they would have to ask themselves,
which do I want? Lose EXP or Run 5 Zones? Just a thought.
